trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that derives from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> and provides support for the correct versions of the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security" />, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession" />, and <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow" /> binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 代表衍生自 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding" /> 的互通繫結，提供 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security" />、<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession" /><see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow" />與 繫結項目正確版本的支援。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The configuration name of the binding.
This value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個值應該是唯一的，因為它會當做繫結的識別使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement" /> class with a specified binding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的繫結，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個繫結項目的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of this binding element.
